alert.note: Alert for Scott; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 9:17PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Simpson, Smith and southern Scott Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 917 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pineville to near Pelahatchie. Movement was south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pineville around 920 PM CDT. Raleigh around 925 PM CDT. Center Ridge and White Oak around 935 PM CDT. Taylorsville around 945 PM CDT. Magee around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sylvarena, Polkville, Mize and Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
